query: SELECT m.id, m.title, m.orderIndex, COUNT(t.id) as topicCount FROM learning_modules m LEFT JOIN learning_topics t ON t.moduleId = m.id WHERE m.subjectId = 870001 GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.orderIndex;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute SELECT m.id, m.title, m.orderIndex, COUNT(t.id) as topicCount FROM learning_modules m LEFT JOIN learning_topics t ON t.moduleId = m.id WHERE m.subjectId = 870001 GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.orderIndex;
